gen:link.msg:message: {$LegalReserves/name()} SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {for $v in $LegalReserves return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesLegalReservesBreakdown_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentCreditComplementDimensionFilter1_ChildrenOfLegalReservesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesLegalReservesBreakdown_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentCreditComplementDimensionFilter1_ChildrenOfLegalReservesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesLegalReservesBreakdown_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentCreditComplementDimensionFilter1_ChildrenOfLegalReservesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesLegalReservesBreakdown_MsgSeparateSumOfChildrenParentCreditComplementDimensionFilter1_ChildrenOfLegalReservesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
